Title: Logged out user can see homepage
Description:
As a logged out user
when I visit the homepage
Then I should see the words "Contact Database"

Title: Logged out user can get to the log in form
Description:
As a logged out user
When I visit the homepage
Then I should see a "Login" link
And when I click the "Login" link
Then I should see a form with fields for username and password

Submitting the form is in the next story

Title: User can log in
Description:
As a user
When I click "Login" on the home page
And I fill in the sign in form
Then I should be back on the home page
And I should see "Welcome, <username>"
Where <username> is the logged in user's username
And I should not see a "Login" link

Title: User can see their contacts
Description:
As a logged in user
When I visit the home page
Then I should see a list of my contacts and their Name and Email

Title: User can log out
Description:
As a logged in user
When I click "Logout"
Then I should not see "Welcome <username>"
And I should see the "Login" link
